features: Eco-friendly Classic Granite – Non-stick Granite Material, PFOS,PFOA free, our cookware ensures your daily cooking is always safer and healthier.
Easy To Clean – Just wipe it with a paper towel or rinse it with water, Less Co2 emission and Less water wasted.

Suitable For All Stoves – Heats up quickly and evenly with extended bottom design. High magnetic conductive stainless steel base allows our nonstick cookware to work on all cooktops, including induction.

Less Oil Needed & Less Smoke Released: Our non-stick frying pan can be used for any cooking needs like egg pan,omelette pan, or grill pan with less oil. Reduce unnecessary fat intake, and stay away from a smoky kitchen.

Service & Guarantee – Each CAROTE cookware passes strict multi inspection process.In case you received defect items caused by delivery, please don't hesitate to reach out, thanks. You will be guaranteed to get 100% refund or a new replacement.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 5x Extra Nonstick Performance A top level nonstick granite pan with 5x Ultra Non-stick performance. Even the simplest recipes get star treatment with Carote's unique and stylish kitchen pots and pans set. A Perfect Nonstick Frying Pan Carote Classic Granite nonstick frying pan meets multiple needs for daily cooking. A versatile pan with higher body designed equals to an egg pan, an omelette pan or a grill pan at the same time!
Previous page Next page 1 Super Easy to Clean 2 Heat Up Fast and Evenly 3 Less Oil Intake

We Care, We Protect The natural material extracted from granite is health for daily use. With the super nonstick property,Carote classic pots and pans set is welcomed over 30 countries and regions. Carote Core-Tech makes our enhanced granite cookware with: Ultra Nonstick Performance.Extra Durability.Super easy to clean.

Why with this very affordable offer? Carote cut all the middleman from the supply chain, we sell directly from factory to your hand, save all the extra cost from each part, set global service team all by ourselves.Enjoy the benefit with the best value cookware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for Omelets
reviews.reviewText: We love this little pan! It is perfect for omelets. We have been using it frequently for over a month and it turns out beautiful omelets every time. The eggs do not stick at all and it wipes clean easily. The weight of the pan surprised me. The pan heats evenly, the lid fits well, and its handle is comfortable to grasp. The larger pans from this set are now on my shopping list! I would recommend this pan to everyone looking for a small pan for eggs and omelets.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non Stick Egg Pan
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because we have an induction cook top and have the heaviest pans I have ever had to pick up. Chantal, are top of the line, so I worried anything else would not be that great but I just wanted an egg pan to make omelets. A non stick one would be perfect! This pan did not disappoint! It is the perfect size for an omelet, or to cook any type eggs you can dream up. A small amount of butter and the best egg I have ever made. Nothing sticks to it and it heats up quickly! Easy to clean as it is light weight and a very pretty pan also. I cant say anything negative about this pan. I tell most of my family and friends about this cookware and have actually bought more to use instead of the seriously heavy Chantal Brand I have.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works better than my $90 pan
reviews.reviewText: The granite finish is lightweight, looks good and VERY nonstick. It seems very durable, and it heats pretty well. This pan doesn't have the same 'heft' as a good heavy-bottomed stainless pan..but that's not what I wanted this time. It's easy to take care of, it works-- and the price is right! Going tor buy more from this brand

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great looking addition to your kitchen.
reviews.reviewText: First off, love the pan. It looks good, feels good and cooks good. I had a lot of confidence when cooking with this pan that I hadn't normally had because of the crappy pans I have been using. My first meal was chicken quesadillas. All of the ingredients cooked wonderfully.Cleanup was easy. After cooling down, I was able to simply wipe out the pan with a paper towel, then wash and dry. Nothing sticked to the surface of the pan and cleanup was a breeze.The negative- in my 3rd picture, you can see where I had a spill of the ingredients when I was flipping my quesadillas. The outside of the pan is not coated in the same non-stick as the inside. So there is a burn on the outside of the pan that I have not been able to completely remove. Inside of the pan is perfect. Just beware of messes on the outside.I would buy again and will most likely get the remainder of the matching set to replace the remainder of the pans in my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So fa.r so excellent
reviews.reviewText: This Carote frypan arrived, as I recall, well-packed and protected. There was a little information about care, and I have been babying this pan so it doesn't get scratched. It seem very durable thus far I love the fact that when I buy a new induction stove, this will work on it. It is really easy to clean--, (thank you) and I plan to purchase another , larger pan from the same manufacturer. It is light weight, relatively attractive, and best of all, seems to heat evenly, cook well. Yes, I'd recommend it.For all around daily ue , this pan is most welcome in my kitchen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These are my observations using the CAROTE cookware:Pros: Even cooking, meaning heating up to desired temperature and staying there; attractive skillet for any kitchen; pinhole in lids to allow steam to vent; well-packaged upon delivery, foods do not seem to stick or burn easily (unlike my Anolon 12" skillet that overheats AND developed a scratch/spot that kept growing with each use. I had only been cooking in it about 2 months and always used wooden spoons) BUT...I digress.Cons: Only one handle, no secondary grip like my Anolon cookware. This was on me, because I didn't notice at the time of purchase; both lids of the 12" and 10" have dents in the metal rings, and you have to work them to make them fit the skillets. I don't know if this is by design (it almost looks that way but not sure what purpose that would serve) or maybe this is a result of production defects, etc. As I stated above, both skillets and lids were very well packaged. Now that I think of it...maybe I just don't know how to maneuver the lids. That is a possibility.Overall, and even with the weird lids...for me, these CAROTE skillets had more pros than cons.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This pan works beautifully on my induction stovetop and is a good size for a quick scramble. Lightweight, easy to clean and inexpensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: can't tell you how many non stick pans i have had over the years. many i have loved but they all wear out too soon and scratch easily. this looks better than previous ones and i really like the high sides. when i stir fry vegetables i like to toss them in the pan and not have to use a spatula. i think this pan will work very well. also, it is the right size, 10'. I have a great 12 inch professional pan that is a tank, but there is no way i am going to be able to toss eggs in the air or other restaurant type techniques. I was afraid this pan would be too small but because the sides are high it looks like it will hold plenty. The other thing is the non stick. Great so far. I cooked some grilled toast and nothing stuck. Did not feel the need to use soap because i had only used olive oil in the pan and it wasn't dirty so i just rinsed it under hot water. Not only was the pan completely clean but not one single drop of water was left in the pan- it all slipped completely out! now that is non stick!
Estamos amando essa frigideira, mesmo tendo demorado a chegar, o que ja era esperado, valeu muito a pena. Atendimento da loja tambem muito bom, agil. Sem reclamacoes.
El mejor sartén nada se le pega súper fácil de limpiar ,nada de otras marcas de tv se comparan con este sartén calidad del 1000% súper recomendable
Very sturdy the heat , easy to washed, and comfortable to Carry 🤗👍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: Great little egg pan, one of the few that is easy to clean because it has no rivet heads inside
reviews.reviewText: A small pan is one of my most go-to pans in the kitchen for solo work - scrambled eggs, fried egg, etc. I cook a lot so they get hammered. My previous pan was starting to have a few issues on my induction hob so I had a look around and found this. I was tempted to just replace with my existing brand but took a punt and am pleased I did - its better than my previous "stone/marblesque coating" pan by a distance. Two things for me make this better - firstly there are no handle rivet heads on the inside of the pan, which makes cleaning it easier. This is often overlooked by pan makers, and its a hassle when cleaning off scrambled eggs which stick to the rivet heads. Secondly, the coating is smoother than other types and so it makes it more non-stick and easier to clean. Didn't think I would like the handle as I prefer just plain utilitarian black but it feels comfortable and sturdy to use so I will live with that and it actually looks classy. Am so impressed with it I'm thinking of replacing my other pans with the other models in the range, even though I don't need to...
Una sartén robusta, no se pega, y me ha gustado mucho la tapa. Muy buena calidad precio. Lo que no sé lo que durará el antiadherente en el tiempo.De momento muy recomendable.
